title: Vee Tire Co Attack HPL are on the enduro and downhill offensive w/ tacky TOP40 rubber
content:
Vee Tire Co have introduced a new mountain bike tire for Enduro and Downhill riding; the Attack HPL. Vee tested the Attack HPL at World Cup races in 2020, and more recently at Freeride Fiesta. The newly formed Brigade Team will also run it this season on their prototype Production Priv√©e downhill bikes. Before we […]

The post Vee Tire Co Attack HPL are on the enduro and downhill offensive w/ tacky TOP40 rubber appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
